name: Param.ai
description: Param use artificial intelligence to automate candidate screening, reduce time to fill jobs, delivering 5X better candidate experience. Integrate with your favourite tools to get seamless business experience. With Marketplace you can connect your business tools to Param Recruit and customise your workflow.

Headline: Data driven predictions to help you hire smarter
ShortDescription: Intelligent Recruiting Software Designed for Efficient Hiring

Highlights.name: Intuitive & easy-to-use interface
Highlights.description: The clean design and intuitive dashboard makes it easier for your team to onboard quickly.

Highlights.name: Get expert help 24x7
Highlights.description: Need help with anything? Our expert team is available 24x7 via chat, email and phone.

Highlights.name: Plans tailored for your needs
Highlights.description: Whether you are a startup or an enterprise, our plans are designed to fit all your needs.

enhanced_description: Param.ai is an intelligent recruiting software leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) to automate candidate screening and reduce time to fill jobs. It provides data-driven predictions to help organizations hire smarter and more efficiently, aiming for a 5X better candidate experience. The platform facilitates bias-free hiring decisions and supports smart conversations for a richer candidate journey. It integrates seamlessly with various business tools through a marketplace, allowing users to connect their favorite tools to Param Recruit and customize their workflows. Designed with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, it ensures quick team onboarding. Param.ai offers 24x7 expert support and tailored plans to fit the needs of startups, small enterprises, large enterprises, and global enterprises.
key_use_cases: Reducing time to fill open positions
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive integration marketplace for customizable workflows
Intuitive and easy-to-use interface for quick team onboarding
24/7 expert customer support (via chat, email, and phone)
Scalable and tailored plans for diverse company sizes (startup to global enterprise)
implementation_scenarios: Integration with existing business tools via a marketplace
integration_capabilities: Integration with various business tools via a marketplace
roi_benefits: Enhanced quality of hire through data-driven decisions
scalability_features: Designed for scalability across startups to global enterprises
Flexible plans tailored for various company sizes and needs
